synopsis: The android and idol Miss Monochrome visits the summit of Mt. Fuji to pray that her recently released first album is a hit, and for her live tour's success.

Miss Monochrome and the others hold a publicity meeting at Heimin Records, and determine that in order to surpass Super Idol Kikuko, who sells 100,002,000 copies of her albums, they need to increase Miss Monochrome's visibility.
Miss Monochrome wakes up in her 4.5 tatami-mat apartment, suddenly wonders what would happen if she flipped the positive and negative ends of her battery, and decides to test it out...
Miss Monochrome enters the Mascot Character Grand Prix!
Miss Monochrome finds KIKUKO collaboration on the shelf at the convenience store, and declares that she'll come up with a huge collaboration project herself.
Miss Monochrome and her gang head to Okayama for their last rehearsal before the live tour.

Miss Monochrome holds a live concert in Osaka! After the concert, when Miss Monochrome and the others go compaigning to promote her CD and tour, as well as to see the sights, they run into Kikuko, who has come to Osaka to preview a different concert venue.
One rainy day, Miss Monochrome picks up a helpless white cat on her way home and nurses it through the night.
Miss Monochrome's live tour heads to Fukuoka!

Miss Monochrome's live tour lands in Sendai! After, she plans to board the last bullet train to make a recording for a musical program the next morning but just misses it. It's looking like she will have to cancel this long-awaited show, but...

Following her concert, Miss Monochrome is feeling down after holding a planned, well-balanced Question Corner. She wants to be more unpredictable so that she can surprise her fans. This is when a brand new idea strikes her...
Miss Monochrome's first tour lands in Hokkaido! Following the concert, Miss Monochrome meets a fan named Kita Umio while doing promotional activities in her mascot outfit.
Miss Monochrome's first tour reaches its final performance. After the concert, Miss Monochrome, who had made a promise with a certain fan, heads to a wrap-up party along with the entire crew.
